de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids

Interface ArrayDBIDs

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DBIDs, Iterable<DBID>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArrayModifiableDBIDs, ArrayStaticDBIDs, DBID, DBIDRange
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyDBIDs, GenericArrayModifiableDBIDs, IntegerArrayStaticDBIDs, IntegerDBID, IntegerDBIDRange, KNNUtil.DBIDView, TroveArrayDBIDs, TroveArrayModifiableDBIDs, TroveArrayStaticDBIDs

    public interface ArrayDBIDs
extends DBIDs
    Interface for array based DBIDs.

    • Method Summary

      • binarySearch

        int binarySearch(DBID key)
        Search for the position of the given key, assuming that the data set is sorted. For keys not found, -(1+insertion position) is returned, as for Java Collections.binarySearch(java.util.List<? extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>>, T)
        Parameters:
        key - Key to search for
        Returns:
        Offset of key
